column4: I'm trying to do a frugal install (boot ubuntu without a disc) but having some troubles. Anyone here familiar with this process?
trying to boot what exactly? the iso file? a flash drive?
that makes a specialized 'live cd' type install to the hard drive. it will not be the same as a normal install. You wont be able to save changes.
I always make bootable flash drive media to install from. I never burn cd's any more
